title: Bug 7785: SaveAs Forgets the file type
description: Bug 7785: SaveAs Forgets the file type. The icon has also changed from the parent javafile icon to a generic file icon.
OB: When using the SaveAs feature, the file extension is not shown in the Navigator after saving the file.
EB: The file extension should be displayed in the Navigator after using the SaveAs feature.
SR:
To reproduce:
1) Open an existing java file
2) Modify the file (e.g., move an existing class)
3) Click the SaveAs icon, next to the Save Icon
4) In the dialog that appears, browse for a valid container location
5) Type the filename without the extension
6) Click Ok

Expected result: The file is added to the specified location in the Navigator with the correct file extension.
